name: Treasure in a hole
description:
You have heard of a treasure buried in this area, find a way to track the treasure and dig it out but silently as this area has an historical importance and you are not allowed to be seen digging holes in it...

Controls:

Press W-A-S-D to move

Click left mouse button to perform task with equiped tool

Instructions:

1) Follow the tracker to reach to the location of the possible treasure

2) Get shovel from backpack and dig the ground, be carefull, have to do the clicking slowly or you will make a lot of noise and alert everyone

3) Keep on repeating the steps untill you find the treasure

Tips/Hints:

1) When you press the button in second location, the tracker give you new location only for a limited time, use wormhole to get to longer distance faster

2) To get to location inside water, shoot a black hole in water to let blackhole suck all the water

3) to move from ground to underwater use wormhole gun

4) You can use blackhole gun to clear out any foliage between you and location.

Best luck and thanks for playing my game :)
